backend.storage.file.img

Class Img

  • java.lang.Object
    • backend.storage.file.img.Img

  • public class Img
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to represent the raw images contained within the evidence files managed by PEMS.
    Since:
    0.1
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Jacob Jones, Andrew Rottier

    • Constructor Detail

      • Img

        public Img(LiveFile parentFile)
    throws InvalidFileException
        Populates instance fields and pushes the original unedited version of image to currentHistorySequence. Also generates a fitted ImgIcon object used to display this image within the user interface.
        Parameters:
        parentFile - the instance of LiveFile that this image is associated with
        Throws:
        InvalidFileException - if there is an error reading the image into memory
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the parameter is null

        public java.lang.String getTimestamp()
        Returns a String value containing the timestamp for the instant that this image was originally created.

        String value containing the timestamp for the instant that this image was originally created

      • undo

        public void undo()
        Undoes the most recent action taken by the user by popping a value from currentHistorySequence and pushing it to undoneHistorySequence.

      • redo

        public void redo()
        Redoes the most recent action undone by the user by popping a value from undoneHistorySequence and pushing it to currentHistorySequence.

      • addPadding

        public void addPadding(int size,
              int red,
              int green,
              int blue)
        Adds padding on all four sides of image.
        Parameters:
        size - the width of the padding
        red - the red RGB color value for the padding
        green - the green RGB color value for the padding
        blue - the blue RGB color value for the padding
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if size is negative or zero, or if one of the color codes is invalid

      • applyAntiAliasing

        public void applyAntiAliasing()
        Applies an anti aliasing procedure to image.

      • brightenImage

        public void brightenImage()
        Brightens image by 10%.

      • cropImage

        public void cropImage(int x,
             int y,
             int width,
             int height)
        Crops image to the specified dimensions.
        Parameters:
        x - the x value to begin the crop at
        y - the y value to begin the crop at
        width - the width of the crop
        height - the height of the crop
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any of the dimension parameters are invalid

      • darkenImage

        public void darkenImage()
        Darkens image by 10%.

      • resizeImage

        public void resizeImage(org.imgscalr.Scalr.Method method,
               int size)
        Resizes image to the specified size.
        Parameters:
        method - the resizing method to use (BALANCED, SPEED, QUALITY, etc.)
        size - the new size of the image
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any parameters are null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if size is negative or zero

      • resizeImage

        public void resizeImage(org.imgscalr.Scalr.Method method,
               int width,
               int height)
        Resizes image to the specified width and height.
        Parameters:
        method - the resizing method to use (BALANCED, SPEED, QUALITY, etc.)
        width - the new width of the image
        height - the new height of the image
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any parameters are null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if width or height is negative or zero

      • rotateRight90

        public void rotateRight90()
        Rotates image 90 degrees to the right.

      • rotateRight180

        public void rotateRight180()
        Rotates image 180 degrees to the right.

      • rotateRight270

        public void rotateRight270()
        Rotates image 270 degrees to the right.

      • toGrayscale

        public void toGrayscale()
        Converts image to grayscale format.

      • retrieveImage

        private java.awt.image.BufferedImage retrieveImage()
                                            throws InvalidFileException
        Uses the file path from parentFile to read the associated BufferedImage into memory.
        Returns:
        BufferedImage contained within parentFile
        Throws:
        InvalidFileException - if the image can not be read into memory

      • retrieveMetadata

        private org.apache.sanselan.common.IImageMetadata retrieveMetadata()
                                                            throws InvalidFileException
        Attempts to find and read the metadata for image.
        Returns:
        IImageMetadata object associated with image and parentFile
        Throws:
        InvalidFileException - if the image metadata can not be read into memory

      • retrieveTimestamp

        private java.lang.String retrieveTimestamp()
        Acquires the value from one of the timestamp fields contained in metadata if said field is not null. Order of precedence for these fields, from first to last, is "Date Time Original" > "Create Date" > "Modify Date".
        Returns:
        String containing the timestamp associated with this file, or "DATE NOT FOUND" if a timestamp cannot be found

      • generateIcon

        private ImgIcon generateIcon()
        Returns an instance of ImgIcon generated using the raw image contained within this object.
        Returns:
        instance of ImgIcon generated using the raw image contained within this object

      • imgChanged

        private void imgChanged()
        Called when any of the ImgScalr editing functions are applied to image. Generates a new icon using the edited image. Clears the undone history sequences for both the image and its representative icon.
